content.rendered:
Creator Rangita Pritish Nandy

Directed by Anu Menon. Nupur Asthana. Joyeeta Patpatia

Written by Devika Bhagat. Ishita Moitra. Rangita Pritish Nandy. Ishita Pritish Nandy

Cast Sayani Gupta( Damini Roy / …30 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Kirti Kulhari( Anjana Menon30 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Gurbani( Umang Singh30 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Maanvi Gagroo( Siddhi Patel30 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Prateik Babbar( Jeh Wadia30 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Neil Bhoopalam( Varun Khanna / …27 episodes, 2019-2022 ). Manoj Kolhatkar( Yogendra Deshpande1 episode, 2022 ). Pranjal Trivedi( Audience Member at Truck1 episode, 2022 ). Tashi Tobgay( Bosco1 episode, 2022 ). Sanjay Deoghare( Banker 21 episode, 2022 ). Sneha Maloo( Gautam’s Mom1 episode, 2022 ). Srishti Shrivastava( Student 11 episode, 2022 ). Charu Kapoor( Neetu1 episode, 2022 ). Satya Kam Anand( Student 21 episode, 2022 ). Parnalekha(1 episode, 2019 ). Advait Kottary( Kartik Desai1 episode, 2019 ). Sanjay Bhatia( The Judge1 episode, 2019 ). Olly Esse( Red haired girl1 episode, 2019 ). Aamir Singh( Amit1 episode, 2019 ). Rashmi Vaidyalingam( Amma1 episode, 2019 ). Monica Mahendru( Deepika Sheth1 episode, 2019 ). Archak Chhabra( Karan1 episode, 2019 ). Languages Hindi. English

Producers Pallab Bhattacharya. Anoop Ram Kumar. Ishita Pritish Nandy. Pritish Nandy. Rangita Pritish Nandy. Satish Shelke. Vighnesh Chendwankar. Anshuman Rajaurya. Sameer Antelawala. Uluc Yemen Aslan. Satyaa Iyer. Sidhu Manpreet. Shantanu Tungare. Haider Ali

Production Pritish Nandy Communications (PNC).

Certificate 15+

Official site Amazon PrimeVideo

Season 3

Episodes 10
